alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden, southeastern Liberty, southwestern Jefferson, Leon and northeastern Franklin Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Midway to 15 miles north of Carrabelle. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, St. Marks, Midway, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Quincy, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Cody, Wakulla Springs, South City, Medart, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Natural Bridge and Liveoak Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
